intro.description: A set of files can be open at once for comparison.

item.title: Project Explorer
item.description: In the Project Explorer, multiple files can be selected in the usual graphical manner by shift-clicking a range of entries and/or control-clicking individual entries. Once satisfied with the selection, right-click to bring up the context menu and select DAWN > Compare files. For example, select three of the four files in data/examples/results.

item.title: File Navigator
item.description: File Navigator allows you to do the same as the project explorer with the only difference being in the context menu where you simply select Compare files.

item.title: Compare Files Editor
item.description: Both opening methods bring up a Compare Files editor. This editor is introduced in the next part.
